content: नियमित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Checked, curbed, restrained. {@--2@} Moderated, tempered. {@--3@} Removed, lessened. {@--4@} Governed, guided. {@--5@} Regulated, prescribed, laid down. {@--6@} Fixed, agreed upon, stipulated. {@--7@} Bound, confined. {@--8@} Observed (as a vow or penance).
